game.name: Worms Reloaded: The "Pre-order Forts and Hats" DLC Pack
game.shortDescription: For Worms™ Reloaded players who enjoy the strategic action and visual variety of the 'Fort mode', or for those who have seen them while playing online and wished they could have them too, this DLC pack offers an opportunity to purchase the previously exclusive x10 Forts that have been only available
game.shortDescriptionEn: For Worms™ Reloaded players who enjoy the strategic action and visual variety of the 'Fort mode', or for those who have seen them while playing online and wished they could have them too, this DLC pack offers an opportunity to purchase the previously exclusive x10 Forts that have been only available
